experiences.title: Engagement Manager / Associate
experiences.subtitle: Strategy & transformation across food, CPG, and growth-stage work
experiences.summary: Led teams on strategy and growth problems, often at the intersection of innovation, commercialization, and operational execution.

paragraphs: Representative themes: portfolio strategy, commercialization roadmaps, operating model design, and diligence-style analysis.
I like ambiguous problems where a clean narrative needs to be backed by real numbers.

sub_experiences.title: Food-tech commercialization roadmap
sub_experiences.subtitle: Scaled an early-stage platform toward repeatable GTM
sub_experiences.summary: Built a cost-down + commercialization roadmap; aligned stakeholders around a sequenced plan.

paragraphs: Work product included a cost parity model, partner landscape, and phased customer acquisition plan.

sub_experiences.title: Private equity diligence — restaurants
sub_experiences.subtitle: Market sizing + unit economics + expansion thesis
sub_experiences.summary: Built the investment narrative under time pressure; pressure-tested the growth plan.

experiences.title: Chief of Staff / Strategy
experiences.subtitle: Precision fermentation — building a category
experiences.summary: Supported leadership across strategy, cross-functional execution, and narrative building for a high-growth food-tech company.

paragraphs: Worked on priorities spanning commercialization, partner strategy, and internal operating cadence.
Helped translate complex technical realities into crisp decisions and timelines.

experiences.title: UC Davis commercialization hub
experiences.subtitle: Benchmarking + operating model design
experiences.summary: Helping UC Davis design a model to become a global hub for food & ag tech commercialization.

experiences.title: Research & Analytics
experiences.subtitle: Survey design + insights
experiences.summary: Built surveys and insights pipelines to understand student sentiment at scale.

experiences.title: WinGen (lead gen + CRM)
experiences.subtitle: Home services growth platform
experiences.summary: Building a lead generation + CRM integration layer for local service businesses.

paragraphs: Focus: lightweight onboarding, integrations, and an operator-friendly workflow.
This site architecture (data-driven cards + CMS) is similar to how I like building products: modular, fast to iterate.

experiences.title: Earthship Biotecture
experiences.subtitle: Off-grid systems + construction
experiences.summary: Hands-on experience building and learning off-grid architecture and water/energy systems.

paragraphs: I’m drawn to physical systems: constraints are real, and feedback is immediate.
This experience shaped how I think about resource flows (energy, water, materials) and practical design.

experiences.title: Woodworking
experiences.subtitle: Furniture, joinery, and iterative design
experiences.summary: A long-running practice in making: tools, materials, and taste.

paragraphs: Woodworking is where I get to be both engineer and artist: structure and finish matter.
Over time I’ve developed a preference for simple forms, strong joints, and intentional details.

sub_experiences.title: Walnut side table
sub_experiences.subtitle: Minimal geometry, thoughtful grain
sub_experiences.summary: Designed and built a compact table with a clean silhouette and durable joinery.

paragraphs: (Add build notes, process photos, and lessons learned.)

sub_experiences.title: Workshop wall system
sub_experiences.subtitle: Tool storage + modularity
sub_experiences.summary: Built a modular wall to keep tools visible and workflows smooth.

experiences.title: Human skull evolution video
experiences.subtitle: Research + storytelling
experiences.summary: Produced an educational video exploring the evolution of the human skull (script, narrative arc, visuals).

paragraphs: This is a good example of my creative workflow: research deeply, build a clear narrative, then execute with a high bar on clarity.
